TEXT.TITLE: CROP GENETICS INITIAL OFFERING UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: <Crop Genetics International Corp> said an initial public offering of 1,600,000 common shares is underway at 14.50 dlrs per share through underwriters led by <Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc>. Reuter
